name: Sergeant, Your Wife Ran Away Again
nutshell: Hidden deep in merit and fame, the innocent girl staged a shocking counterattack. Coincidence and inevitableness, acting and scheming, destiny and romance. The epic love story of the overbearing sergeant and the most innocent girl!

name: Akiba Zaijuu
nutshell: An informational manga that involves living in Akihabara and reporting on all its interesting spots from personal experience.

name: Omae de Dame Nara Mou Dame da dj - a while ago
nutshell:
Related Series
Omaede Dame Nara Moudameda (Main Story)

name: Masako Watanabe Masterpiece Selection - Flowers, Western Mansions, and Fashion
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
Masako Watanabe is still active as the oldest mangaka working today, and is the creator of many major works, including "Saint Rosalind," "The Glass Castle," and "Kinbeibai.
This collection includes "Hall of Flowers" and three other gems from her early blockbuster years.

name: The World of Otome Games Kindergarten is Tough for Mobs
nutshell: Spin-off Comic from "The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs" Starts! A kindergartener mob life comedy! Even when they're tiny, they're still female chauvinists!

name: Dragon's Dogma Revives
nutshell: The story begins in a small village west of the capital and centers on childhood friends Yuugo and Tenia. While Yuugo focuses on being an herbalist, Tenia is a hunter. A force of Arisen knights passes through their town in search of more Arisen to join their ranks. Tenia reveals that she is an Arisen and wants to travel with them.

name: Seraphim
nutshell: A future Earth is devastated by the "Angel Plague," a pandemic that induces apocalyptic visions in the afflicted, even as it ossifies their bodies into dead, seraphic forms. A cult-ridden, army-backed medical unit journeys into the heart of a dying Asian city accompanied by Sera, a mysterious girl linked to the phenomenon itself. Have they come here to kill or cure? And is the Angel Plague a withered branch on the tree of life, or somehow a new flowering of existence?

name: Usagi to Neko no Hatsujou Jijou
nutshell: Included in Yagi to Ookami no Hatsujou Jijou tankoubon release.

name: Nonbeing
nutshell: Humanity struggles to survive a barren wasteland full of otherworldly apex predators.

name: Happy Family
nutshell: "Here's a charm to cheer you up. Come drink Mom's milk." Kaho, a normal office worker, was looking forward to her engagement with her lover, Ryota. However, Kaho's normal life takes a sudden turn after Ryota's mother is hospitalized because of an accident. Contrary to her gentle appearance, the mother casts a disturbing gaze towards Kaho... Hidden there was a suspicious relationship that transcended the normal affection between a parent and their child. While she was starting to feel uneasy about Ryota's actions, Kaho consults his father, Tetsuya, and slowly becomes attached to him...

name: Lustful Aquarium
nutshell:
As expected, Iseya's performance is the most beautiful ..."  Sakurai, a novice dolphin trainer, fell in love with the experienced orca trainer Iseya.
An underwater BL featuring an orca trainer x dolphin trainer!

name: Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei Shippaishite Kachi Heroine ni Natte Shimaimashita
nutshell:
She loves the world, but most of all she loves Heathcliff, the brother of the villainess. However, Heathcliff is a guiding character in the game with only a friend ending. So Kyoko ends her short life in a hospital room, earnestly hoping to be reincarnated as the noble villainess Anna Marie and live in a corner of the world with her siblings in secret.
She has just been admitted to a magic academy in the game world, and when she regains her memories of her previous life, she is able to...
"Yes! The world of Majilaba! ...is not the heroine [over here]!"
To her surprise, she had been reincarnated as the heroine Lisa, not the villainous Anna Marie who had been beaten up.
She has the strongest magic power of the light attribute, is strong, and is rather comfortable when she spends time as a lucky and beloved character. Become best friends with Anna Marie, the girl of her dreams, and befriend her fiancé, the prince. Her actions to removed the downfall flag of the villainous daughter are only successful. She thinks she can change the future!
Wait, maybe she can achieve a romantic ending with Heathcliff, the brother of the villainess which never existed! She wants to do everything in her power to make a single-minded attempt at a romance that she had no connection to in her previous life.

name: The Neighbor's Temptation
nutshell: Nagyung couldn't contain her anger at the sound of moans coming from the next room every day. Let's knock on the door where continuous groans keep coming from. A naked neighbour greets us! A hot roco GL with a neighbour!

name: Touhou - Connect Essence (Doujinshi)
nutshell: "Kisume accidentaly ends up in the Myouren Temple, and Hijiri decides to take care of her a while."

name: Mask Danshi wa Koishitakunai no ni
nutshell:
"Mouth is the second sexy body part".
The famous cheerful guy, Saikawa had tried to rip off the gloomy kid, Sayama's mask.
After that day, he had captured Saikawa's attention and Saikawa had volunteered to teach him for the upcoming examination but with one condition, Saikawa can do whatever he wants with what is hiding under Sayama's mask.
He hates it when people touch his bare face, lips and inside his mouth, but he cannot say anything when Saikawa touch them.
The combination between Saikawa's harassment and the awkward mask boy's behaviour, this manga will pack with sexual tension between these two.

name: Kuro Tenkousei
nutshell: Two mysterious transfer students investigate a school where, in the past two months, three student have fallen to their deaths.

name: Uwate na Otoko no Otoshikata
nutshell:
In the rain Yuuichi awaited for 'that man'.
The man that came began by saying something unexpected. Did Yuuichi come to tell that man that he liked him?
Meetings of the footbridge and afterwards some earlier works featuring glasses and labcoats.

name: Shokuryou Jinrui
nutshell: Planet Earth is facing a grave crisis due to global warming and housing and food shortages. What steps can humankind take to counteract these issues while it's practically demolishing itself to survive? Ie suddenly finds himself on the path to discovery, but…

name: Demand Killer
nutshell: The killer, Cong Zhong Feng has always despised those who fail to keep their word, especially those first parties who keep changing their requests! When he meets a bald young painter, Cong Zhong Feng agrees to avenge her for free. Who would have expected that along the way, they would meet “a set of Matryoshka”, who is the ultimate target?

name: Ore no Shita de Agake
nutshell:
Manga based on the BL game developed by Alice Blue. Each storyline has a different author:
Prologue: AKIRA Norikazu
Kurosaki x Higuchi: AMAGI Reno
Kurosaki x Shimizu: IKE Reibun
Kurosaki x Yamaguchi: SAKURA Ryou
Kurosaki x Yoshioka: TAMAQUIS Wren
Yoshioka-centric gag shorts: KYUUSHUU Danji

name: Extreme wastrel
nutshell: Everyone fights monsters to upgrade levels , use their brains to fight and makes successful businesses after their resurrections , as for me, I can only rely on money and walk to the climax of my life by being a wastrel! Look at me, Li Jing Long’s inherit the secret wastrel secretive box!

name: Cope Soul
nutshell: Beelt is a people lover and a prince of the 7th dynasty that resides in the limbo "Reas". The demons see human souls as their toys and do whatever they want with them. Suddenly, a human named Rule goes into limbo and claims that he is Beelt's little brother. But Beelt can't remember any brother who is also human. How will he handle this situation?

name: Owari no Seraph - Owatta sekai to hajimari no koraaru (Doujinshi)
nutshell: MIkaela Hyakuya x Yuuichiro Hyakuya

name: Jihad (SATOMI Kei)
nutshell:
(from ebookjapan):
The day before her wedding, Saeko Izawa, a prosecutor, is kidnapped by a mysterious organization due to the existence of top-secret documents she has unfortunately come across.
Sensing the emergency situation of his fiancee, Kensuke Sakuragi, a former SS (Secret Service) agent, switches to SP (Security Police) and scrambles to rescue the kidnapped Saeko.

name: Houfuku Kanojo to Koukatsu Kareshi
nutshell: Ako was an ordinary school student until she suddenly remembered that she was a demon in her past life…Then she finds that the angel who brought about her death in the previous life has also been reincarnated. And he is none other than her present boyfriend, Yoshi. Ako decides to retaliate against her enemy of her past life, but unfortunately, she cannot evade her attraction towards him! Can she be successful in getting her revenge?

name: NINA
nutshell: The two are similar in name, but their personalities and appearance are the opposite. Seiden and Parkinson's are not compatible. And then one day, in an empty classroom, Parkinson's comes to see Seiden kissing her English teacher and mother, Ella!

name: Touhou - The ⑨-Team (Doujinshi)
nutshell: "Our elite forces unit, formed in vietnam, after being falsely accused and bullied by Reimu managed to escape by offering her donations and fled to the forest. However, wasting away in the forest like this wasn't for us. Using our brawn, we would do anything just to get our hands on our next meal. We do the impossible and smash the great evils of the world. We are the elite bastards, The (9)-Team."

name: Hagane to Wakaba
nutshell: Wakaba Ibuki, 20 years old, is in her first year of marriage. Her beloved husband is a macho cyborg. Machine husband x tiny wife's happy everyday romantic comedy!

name: The Vanished Duchess
nutshell: Mable Ra Robin, uma vez uma duquesa para abrigar Quintrell, desapareceu sem deixar rastro. 5 anos depois, ela aparece na casa de sua família no meio da noite. Mas o nome dela não era mais Duquesa Quintrell, ela agora é Lady Robin porque deixou o marido. Mas há mais uma surpresa, ela trouxe um menino com ela. O nome é Patrick, e ele é filho de um duque sem coração e seu ex-marido, Percival De Quintrell.

name: Brothers and Sisters
tags: Long Strip,Romance,Comedy,School Life,Web Comic,Slice of Life,Full Color
nutshell: Brothers and sisters, don't fight because of us!
